thread.title: Battlefield 3 and Bad Company 2 are now backwards compatible on Xbox One
thread.title_full: Battlefield 3 and Bad Company 2 are now backwards compatible on Xbox One

title: Battlefield 3 and Bad Company 2 are now backwards compatible on Xbox One
text:
Battlefield 3 and Bad Company 2 are now backwards compatible on Xbox One Along with Dragon Age Origins, Ghostbusters and more. 
Seven new games were added to the increasingly vast Xbox One backwards compatibility library . 
Both Battlefield: Bad Company 2 and Battlefield 3 made the list, making all contemporary Battlefields playable on Microsoft's latest console. It's worth noting that Battlefield 3 is only backwards compatible on disc, however. 
BioWare's beloved action RPG Dragon Age: Oranges also made the cut. 
Elsewhere added were Ghostbusters, XBLA puzzler The Splatters, retro bullet hell shmup Strania, and top-down combat racer Scrap Metal.
